data.label: Workflow
data.query:
"INSTANCE"."CREATION_DATE" >= (TO_DATE('01-01-2017', 'DD-MM-YY')) AND ( ? = 'nachforderung' AND ( 13 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") AND 14 NOT IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") )
OR ? = 'pendente_publikationen' AND ( 1 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") AND 15 NOT IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") )
OR ? = 'einsprachen' AND ( 21 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") AND 15 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") )
OR ? = 'dossier_zum_freischalten' AND ( 1 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") AND 16 NOT IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") )
OR ? = 'erteilte_baubewilligungen' AND ( 47 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") AND 55 NOT IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") )
OR ? = 'abgelaufene_baubewilligungen' AND ( 71 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") AND 55 NOT IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") AND 1 IN (SELECT CASE WHEN WORKFLOW_DATE < SYSDATE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID" AND WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID = 71) )
OR ? = 'schnurgeruestabnahmen_pendent' AND ( 55 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") AND 56 NOT IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") )
OR ? = 'baustellen_in_betrieb' AND ( 55 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") AND 67 NOT IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") )
OR ? = 'endabnahmen_pendent' AND ( 67 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") AND 59 NOT IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") )
OR ? = 'rechtsmittelverfahren' AND ( ( 48 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") OR 50 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") OR 52 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") OR 63 IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") ) AND 54 NOT IN (SELECT "WORKFLOW_ITEM_ID" FROM WORKFLOW_ENTRY WHERE INSTANCE_ID = "INSTANCE"."INSTANCE_ID") ))
